arts.ttl: Italian Champions League Nightmare: Inter Shine, Milan and Juventus Falter, Atalanta Unlucky
arts.sum: The Champions League group stage has concluded with mixed fortunes for Italian clubs. Inter Milan emerged as the sole Italian representative directly qualifying for the Round of 16, finishing an impressive fourth in the overall standings. The post Italian Champions League Nightmare: Inter Shine, Milan and Juventus Falter, Atalanta Unlucky appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: “We Want to Go All the Way”: Inzaghi’s Inter Milan Eyes Champions League Glory
arts.sum: Inter Milan coach Simone Inzaghi has set his sights on Champions League glory following his team's impressive 3-0 victory over Monaco, which secured their place in the Round of 16 as the fourth-ranked team overall. The post “We Want to Go All the Way”: Inzaghi’s Inter Milan Eyes Champions League Glory appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Lautaro becomes Inter's top goalscorer in Champions League with hat trick against Monaco
arts.sum: The Inter Milan captain was given a standing ovation by the San Siro crowd when he was taken off in the 76th minute, with his goals having secured a 3-0 win and place in the round of 16 of the revamped Champions League. “I’m really proud because I’m beating records but as I always say, what’s important is that Inter wins, I am here to help the team, to make all these fans happy,” Lautaro said.

arts.ttl: Champions League Playoff Draw: Milan and Juventus on Collision Course, Inter Await
arts.sum: The final match day of the Champions League Group Phase has set the stage for an intriguing playoff round, with Italian clubs potentially facing each other much earlier than anticipated. As the dust settles on the group stage, the playoff bracket is taking shape, with the official draw scheduled for Friday to finalize the match-ups. The post Champions League Playoff Draw: Milan and Juventus on Collision Course, Inter Await appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.sum: All 36 teams competing in this year's new-look Champions League played their final league fixture, with some banking a play-off place and others moving through to the Round of 16
